acf.title: Head of Business Development, Americas
acf.bio_copy:
Paritosh Singh is Head of Business Development, Americas and responsible for overseeing a team who sources and selects new portfolio managers and investment professionals in the Americas.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2008, Paritosh was a Vice President at Guggenheim Advisors, where he was responsible for quantitative research and risk management. He began his career as an Associate at Applied Decision Analysis, where he focused on quantitative research.

Paritosh received a BS in Chemical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee. He received his PhD in Chemical Engineering from the University of Michigan and was a graduate research assistant at Princeton Material Institute at Princeton University.
